subject: Sales
title: Your Digital Footprint
description: A 60-second lesson on Your Digital Footprint.

hook.text: Before the meeting, the buyer Googles your name. What they find becomes your real first impression.

buildup.text: Your digital footprint is every search result, social post, and mention tied to your name online.

discovery.text: A strong footprint reinforces credibility. A weak one raises doubt before any conversation starts.

twist.text: Many sellers have never Googled themselves. They don't know what buyers see before the first handshake.

climax.text: Google yourself. Clean up the noise. Add value. The story buyers find should be the one you wrote.

punchline.text: Your Google results are your new first impression.

quiz.question: Why should every seller Google their own name?
options: To see what buyers find before meetings
